name: Papyrus Boy
description:
Deliver those scrolls! Your customers are waiting. Avoid the obstacles and make it to the finish, if you can. Set your personal best.

Controls:

W/S - Accelerate/Decelerate

A/D - Turn Left/Turn Right

F/Left-Click - Throw Scroll

Scoring:

Deliver to a correct mailbox = +100 pts.

Hit a correct house with a scroll = +50 pts.

Break a customer's window = -200 pts.

Deliver to an incorrect mailbox = -45 pts.

Hit an incorrect house with a scroll = -50 pts.

Break a non-customer's window = +100 pts.
